scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_ENV=development concurrently "pnpm start:client" "pnpm start:server"
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_ENV=production concurrently "pnpm start:client" "pnpm start:server"
scripts.stage: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DB_ENV=development concurrently "pnpm build:client" "pnpm build:server" && pnpm serve
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DB_ENV=production concurrently "pnpm build:client" "pnpm build:server"
